name: Deloitte LLP
memberOrga: Please refer to our annual reports for more information on Deloitte LLP: https://www2.deloitte.com/uk/en/pages/about-deloitte-uk/articles/annual-reports.html
goal: Deloitte provides audit, tax, consulting and financial advisory services to public and private clients across multiple industries. Our purpose as a firm is to make an impact that matters: for our clients, our people and society. We do this by providing trust and confidence in the capital markets, supporting the growth and competitiveness of UK plc and building the skills of future leaders.
interests: Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Tax, Audit & Accounting and Financial Services, primarily. Other dossiers may also be of interest.
